name: feBlend
desc: This filter blends two objects together using commonly used imaging software blending modes. It performs a pixel-wise combination of two input images.

props.name: mode
props.desc: One of the blend modes defined by Compositing and Blending Level 1. The lacuna value is normal.

props.name: no-composite
props.desc: If the no-composite attribute is present, the specified blend mode must not use alpha compositing. The necessary modifications are defined by Compositing and Blending Level 1
